snippet.title: The Rise of Pinterest -- and Other Top Stories on LinkedIn This Week
snippet.description:
* Daniel Roth
The Rise of Pinterest -- and Other Top Stories on LinkedIn This Week Daniel Roth February 3, 2012
First, some housekeeping: Every Wednesday night, we run the report on what stories were most shared by LinkedIn’s 135-plus million members. That means the news of Facebook’s coming IPO — announced Wednesday, Feb. 1 — had only one day to attempt to rocket to the top of our rankings. A Mashable story about the IPO came close, but didn’t have enough juice to unseat an infographic looking at the rise of Pinterest. That’s fitting, actually, as the top…
* Topics: * Infographic, * LinkedIn News
